adminOrderableEdit.minimumTemperature.in: Minimum storage temperature should be equal to or less than maximum storage temperature.
requisitionView.submitWithVolumeWarn.con: The vaccines in this requisition require ${volumeExcess} liters more than the available cold chain volume at your facility. Are you sure you wish to submit it?
